评论详情: I love the outer kimono part, but not the dress. I feel like the dress ran a little small. Maybe if you have larger chest, the dress is not for you. So I had to order a larger size than usual. Then the dress was quite unattractive on & too big! But the kimono fit great after going up a size. So I wear it over another dress!

评论详情: Dress fabric was thicker than expected and is flattering on! Fits TTS. Kimono is so pretty, have also worn with jeans. Hoping for some more prints to become available!

The colors and patterns go together well. Next time I will get a smaller size because I didn't realize I was down a size already...lol.
This is SO adorable and completely  worth the Price!!! Gets completed all the time.
I loved the color and to have a cover up already for it, it was beautiful and comfortable
